article_title: "Health Independence Accounts" Increase Dependence and Increase Costs

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Private Option cheerleaders in Arkansas have long promised that their ObamaCare Medicaid expansion plan would give patients “skin in the game” and “encourage personal responsibility.” A closer look at the newly introduced Health Independence Accounts highlight that they do the exact opposite, while also increasing dependence and costs. The HIAs are nothing like HSAs.
